description:
The story centers around Shimazu Toyohisa, the real-life samurai who fought in the pivotal Battle of Sekigahara. In his dying moments, Shimazu is transported to a world of magic with other famous warriors throughout history. These warriors are forced to fight each other in an endless battle.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: GATE: Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri
Ulysses: Jeanne d'Arc to Renkin no Kishi
title.english: Ulysses: Jeanne d'Arc and the Alchemist Knight

title.romaji: Choujin Koukousei-tachi wa Isekai demo Yoyuu de Ikinuku you desu!
title.english: High School Prodigies Have It Easy Even In Another World

title.romaji: GATE: Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri 2
